catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Pentateuch
contents_note: Translated into Arabic from the Septuagint by al-Ḥārith ibn Sinān. Defective at beginning and end.
record_origin: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.
